title: memory or CPU
extract: This control center, called the central processing unit (CPU), is a highly complex, extensive set of electronic circuitry that executes stored program instructions. ... Recall that a computer's memory holds data only temporarily, at the time the computer is executing a program.
extract_html: This control center, called the central processing unit (CPU), is a highly complex, extensive set of electronic circuitry that executes stored program instructions. ... Recall that a computer's memory holds data only temporarily, at the time the computer is executing a program.
